qualityRecommendDesc:
Çözünürlük HD, full HD, 1080p video format gereksinimleri
ordinary video requirements
HD>=960x400; full HD>=1280x544; 1080p resolution>= 1920x800
Süre:
HD, full HD, 1080p duration>=15 seconds
Video ortalama kod oranı gereksinimi:
HD when video average code rate>=0.5Mbps, full HD videonun ortalama kod oranı >=0.8Mbps, 1080P videonun ortalama kod oranı >=1.5Mbps

uploadFileExisted: Yükleme başarısız: Bu video zaten COS.TV'de mevcut. Orijinal içerik oluşturucusuysanız, lütfen service@contentos.io adresinden bize e-posta gönderin, telif hakkınızı koruyacağız.

other1: Success. The video will be released at the scheduled time
other2: Scheduled publish successfully. The video will be released at the scheduled time
other3: Success. The video will be released at the scheduled time
other4: Release time must be greater than 2 hours and less than 15 days from the current time, please select again.

limitTrue: Yes, only available for users aged 18 years and older
limitFalse: No, available for teenagers and adults

youtube.name: Dear {name}
youtube.tips1: You have {video} videos, {} followers. We will start transfer {num} videos from YouTube
youtube.noVideo: No new videos have been found yet, they will automatically sync in 5 minutes
youtube.tips2: After the sync is completed, you will be notified in the notification center
youtube.title: Video name
youtube.fans: Authorize YouTube to connect your fans more smoothly
youtube.step1: One click to help you transfer past videos
youtube.step2: Daily Auto-Sync help you to sync your videos on YouTube everyday and get revenue on COS.TV
youtube.step3: After your followers connect their YouTube with COS.TV, they would find and follow you more quickly
youtube.notice: Allow COS.TV to help sync the content on YouTube to COS.TV, and agree to the Privacy Policy agreement
youtube.limit1: Videos longer than 2 hours will not be synced
youtube.limit2: Videos larger than 2GB will be synced with lower picture quality (720p, 480p, etc.)
youtube.limit3: Only 100 of your latest videos will be synced
youtube.limit4: Private or unlisted videos will not be published, but all other video will be synced
youtube.sureClose: Are you sure you want to turn off synchronization?
youtube.warning: During function maintenance, please wait, or upload the video manually

advertising.ruleIntroduction: Now the advertisement is in test phase, thank you for your participation! You could earn advertisement revenue by turning on the advertisement mode.
